segments.text: What a careless mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is oblivious, drying dishes while the sink floods the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's everywhere, ruining the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should have turned off the faucet ages ago.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids—stealing cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, about to cause more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's egging him on, hand out for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No supervision at all; this is ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, and it's slippery—accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's neat, but inside it's a joke.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not noticing any of this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets will be warped from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids shouldn't be climbing like that; it's irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before you regret it.
segments.speaker: PAR
